system.effect:
This book tells you which mushrooms are good to eat and which ones will give you a bad trip.

Rank 1 - Novice Survival: You automatically identify all Tiny Mushrooms, Big Mushrooms, and Balm Mushrooms you pick. Whenever you or your Pok√©mon consume one of those Mushrooms, they ignore the negative effect of the Mushroom (Hit Point loss, Poison, Combat Stage loss).
Rank 2 - Adept Survival: You can create the Hearty Meal Chef Recipe as an Extended Action but only by using Mushrooms as ingredients.
system.name: A Field Guide to Fungi
